snippet: Israel’s ambassador rebuts several assertions in a Times editorial about Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu.
abstract: Letter from Israeli ambassador to United States Ron Dermer responds to March 14 Editorial on stormy relationship between Israeli Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu and Pres Barack Obama.
lead_paragraph: Israel’s ambassador rebuts several assertions in a Times editorial about Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu.

headline.print_headline: The Visit That Wasn’t: The Israeli Ambassador’s View
headline.main: The Visit That Wasn’t: The Israeli Ambassador’s View
